snippet: The annual H.I.V./AIDS fundraiser featured a presentation by Charlize Theron, a fashion show by Jean Paul Gaultier and lots of golden dresses.
abstract: The annual H.I.V./AIDS fundraiser featured a presentation by Charlize Theron, a fashion show by Jean Paul Gaultier and lots of golden dresses.

headline.main: All That Glittered at the Life Ball 2015 in Vienna
